/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is flanked by buildings and trees, creating a harmonious blend of urban and natural elements. Cars are parked along the sides of the street, adding a touch of modern life to the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene.
